thread.section_title: SelectQuote Auto & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelectQuote Auto & Home | selectquoteautoandhome.com
thread.title: Mabuti Ng'andu
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Mabuti Ng'andu

author: Mabuti Ng'andu
title: Mabuti Ng'andu
text: I was glad I chose to work with SelectQuote: . They made the entire home insurance shopping ordeal very easy for me. They asked for my mortgage lenders' details, worked directly with them to get the information needed, and even pulled up my current car insurance details and offered me a far better deal (home and auto) with increased coverage! All of this was accomplished in a little over an hour, but through three quick phone calls that lasted no more than 10 minutes each. I'm VERY impressed.
